main event: A light was observed moving rapidly across the sky in Pierz, Minnesota on August 6, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 10 seconds,The light was observed near the constellation Draco,The light appeared to brighten and dim several times during the observation,The witness and their father both noted the object's speed was faster than any satellite,The object faded out before the witnesses could determine what it was.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: A person observing the stars with their father
